text: Era (abagatta ku Katonda e bintu e birala) baagamba nti amawako gâ€™ebisolo gakkirizibwa kuliibwa basajja bokka mu ffe, era tegakkirizibwa bakyala baffe, naye (amawako ago) bwegavaamu nga gafudde olwo bonna bakkiziribwa okubirya, Katonda ajja kubasasula olw'okutetenkanya kwabwe okwo, anti mazima Katonda mugoba nsonga, muyitirizu wa kumanya
